title: Calls for police to shoot down drones after Munich airport disruption – latest updates
summary: The Prime Minister of Bavaria has urged for enhanced air defense systems in Germany following a recent incident. This call for action reflects growing concerns over national security and the need to protect against potential aerial threats. The demand comes as part of broader discussions on military readiness in the country.

title: England fans ‘astonished’ by World Cup ticket prices; Antony hits out at United treatment: football – live
summary: Join our writers as they provide updates and insights on the latest football news ahead of the weekend's matches, keeping fans informed and engaged.

title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs to be sentenced after pleading with judge for ‘second chance’ – live updates
summary: A music mogul has been convicted of prostitution charges, potentially facing a lengthy prison sentence. Court proceedings regarding the case are set to begin at 10 AM Eastern Time. The conviction marks a significant development in the mogul's legal troubles.

title: UK political class ‘poisoned by wealth’, says Zack Polanski as he sets out plan to tax assets of richest 1% – UK politics live
summary: Polanski has urged for a deeper discussion on patriotism that transcends mere flag-waving. He emphasizes the importance of examining the values and principles behind national pride. The call suggests a need for more meaningful engagement with the concept of patriotism.

title: Manchester synagogue attack: one victim apparently shot dead by police
summary: Suspect Jihad al-Shamie was found unarmed during an incident involving police. The only gunfire exchanged was from the officers present at the scene. No shots were fired by the suspect.
